dct_description_sm: Includes 2 ancillary maps: Beijing cheng zhi bian qian tu -- Beijing cheng qu fa zhan tu. Includes 2 ancillary maps: 北京城址变迁图 -- 北京城区发展图.
dct_publisher_sm: [北京] : 中国地图出版社 : 西华书店北京发行所发行, [1987]
[Beijing] : Zhongguo di tu chu ban she : Xin Hua shu dian Beijing fa xing suo fa xing, 1987.
